name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-add-formcustomizer-to-list
title: Add Form Customizer to List Web Part
shortDescription: A React based SPFx utility web part which will help admins/user(s) to associate and remove association of the list form customizer extension to a particular list.
longDescription: A react based SPFx utility web part which will help admins/user(s) to associate and remove association of the list form customizer extension to a particular list.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
